text:
Oh... It's cold...
The train was warm, so it feels even colder now.

Koito, could you walk right behind me?
It might block the wind a bit.

......Ah, huh?
Producer-san, aren't you wearing gloves?

Oh, well, I completely forgot.
I forgot to bring them...

This is... a hand warmer?
Thank you, I'll gratefully accept it.

N-No, it's nothing...!
But please remember next time...!
